Title: Cortical control: Learning from the lamprey
Abstract: © 2015 Elsevier Ltd All rights reserved.The function of the motor cortex has been a persistent mystery. A recent study has found striking correspondence between the descending projections of lamprey pallium and mammalian motor cortex, encouraging comparative studies of the origin (and role) of forebrain motor control.
